original: @554b / /dur khrod bdag mos gsol pa /
analyzed: @554b / /dur khrod bdag mos gsol pa /
translated: The charnel ground's Vajravarahi asked:

original: lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni //
analyzed: lha mo rnams kyi sku mdog ni //
translated: The colors of the goddesses🔽are said to be white, red, and black.

original: ji ltar shes ni grol @555a *//🔽grol bar 'gyur //🔽phag mo zhes bya //
analyzed: ji ltar shes ni grol @555a *// grol bar 'gyur // phag mo zhes bya //
translated: How are they known to be liberated?🔽What is meant by 'Vajravarahi'?

original: phag mo zhes bya gang la bya //
analyzed: phag mo zhes bya gang la bya //
translated: What is meant by 'Vajravarahi'?

original: yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal //
analyzed: yi ge'i don ni gang la bskyal //
translated: What is the meaning of the syllables?

original: bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya //
analyzed: bskyed rdzogs ngo bo gang la bya //
translated: What is the essence of the generation and completion?

original: dpa' bo he ru kas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: dpa' bo he ru kas bka' stsal pa /
translated: The hero Heruka replied:

original: nyon cig dur khrod phag mo khyod //
analyzed: nyon cig dur khrod phag mo khyod //
translated: Listen, you charnel ground's Vajravarahi!

original: nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos ba //
analyzed: nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos ba //
translated: Unstained by the faults of negativity,

original: dkar zhing sbros bral zhi bar byed //
analyzed: dkar zhing sbros bral zhi bar byed //
translated: white, free from elaboration, pacifying.

original: ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa //
analyzed: ma chags skyon gyis ma gos pa //
translated: Unstained by the fault of non-attachment,

original: dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum /
analyzed: dmar la gdang ba sgra sgrogs yum /
translated: red, radiant, resounding mother.

original: skyon med sems nyid rang dbang 'dus //
analyzed: skyon med sems nyid rang dbang 'dus //
translated: The faultless mind itself is gathered into its own domain.

original: gnyen po gcig kyang mi 'gyur bas //
analyzed: gnyen po gcig kyang mi 'gyur bas //
translated: Since there is not even one antidote,

original: khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin //
analyzed: khros ma nam mkha'i kha dog bzhin //
translated: the wrathful one is the color of space.

original: mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol //
analyzed: mi 'gyur rang sems dbyings su grol //
translated: Unchanging, the mind is liberated into the space of the mind itself.

original: che ba ye shes la rgyas pa //🔽ser mo skyon med don grub ma //
analyzed: che ba ye shes la rgyas pa // ser mo skyon med don grub ma //
translated: The great one is expanded upon pristine consciousness.🔽The yellow one is faultless, accomplishing the purpose.

original: ngo bo rgyal la g-yo dang bral //
analyzed: ngo bo rgyal la g-yo dang bral //
translated: The essence is unchanging in the victors.

original: sna tshogs skyon gyis ma gos pas //
analyzed: sna tshogs skyon gyis ma gos pas //
translated: Since it is not tainted by various faults,

original: aindra n'i la'i mthar phyin ma //
analyzed: aindra n'i la'i mthar phyin ma //
translated: It is the perfection of indranīla.

original: sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu 'dus //
analyzed: sna tshogs ngo bo gcig tu 'dus //
translated: The various aspects are gathered into one essence,

original: rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: rnam pa gang yang 'gyur ba med //
translated: And there is no change whatsoever.

original: chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings las 'gyur ba med //
translated: There is no change from the dharmadhātu.

original: rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas //
analyzed: rnam rtog cis kyang ma gos pas //
translated: Since it is not tainted by any conceptuality,

original: phag ces bya ba rtog med yin //
analyzed: phag ces bya ba rtog med yin //
translated: “Pig” is nonconceptuality.

original: dbyings nyid rtog pa sbros bral bas //
analyzed: dbyings nyid rtog pa sbros bral bas //
translated: Since the dhātu itself is free from the proliferation of concepts,

original: me zhas bya ba dbyings su thim //
analyzed: me zhas bya ba dbyings su thim //
translated: “Fire” dissolves into the dhātu.

original: de la phye na rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: de la phye na rnam pa gsum //
translated: If classified, there are three:

original: dam chos skye med phag mo ni //
analyzed: dam chos skye med phag mo ni //
translated: The nonarising dharmatā pig is

original: skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin //
analyzed: skye 'gag med pas chos sku yin //
translated: The dharmakāya because it is free from arising and ceasing.

original: brjod pa sga yi phag mo ni //
analyzed: brjod pa sga yi phag mo ni //
translated: The pig of the expressed syllables is

original: phag ni k'a li thabs yin la //
analyzed: phag ni k'a li thabs yin la //
translated: The pig is the method kāli,

original: mo ni a'a li longs skur 'dod //🔽mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni //
analyzed: mo ni a'a li longs skur 'dod // mtshon pa dbyings kyi phag mo ni //
translated: And the mo is asserted to be the sambhogakāya āli.🔽The pig of the symbolic dhātu

original: stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la //
analyzed: stong nyid mtshon pa'i sku mdog la //
translated: Is the symbolic pig of the empty dhātu.

original: rtog med snying rje phag gi gdong //
analyzed: rtog med snying rje phag gi gdong //
translated: The face of the pig is nonconceptual compassion.

original: thabs dang shes rab phag mo la //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab phag mo la //
translated: The pig of method and wisdom

original: bde stong skyon bral gcer bu @555b ni; ;rtog pa med pas sbrul sku'o //
analyzed: bde stong skyon bral gcer bu @555b ni; ;rtog pa med pas sbrul sku'o //
translated: The nakedness free from the faults of bliss and emptiness🔽is the nirmāṇakāya, due to nonconceptuality.

original: yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas //
analyzed: yig 'bru gsal la mi rtog pas //
translated: The clear syllables are nonconceptual.

original: thim pa na yang cang te'u //
analyzed: thim pa na yang cang te'u //
translated: When they dissolve, there is the hand drum.

original: snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: snang stong mtha' dang bral ba'o //
translated: Appearance and emptiness are free from extremes.

original: bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas //
analyzed: bskyed rdzogs ngo bo dbyer med pas //
translated: Since the essence of the creation and completion [stages] is inseparable,

original: mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i ngang //
analyzed: mtshon pa snang ba stong pa'i ngang //
translated: the illustration is appearance in the state of emptiness.

original: de nyid snang ba'i ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: de nyid snang ba'i ngo bo nyid //
translated: That itself is the essence of appearance.

original: dbyer med zung 'jug khas len bral //
analyzed: dbyer med zung 'jug khas len bral //
translated: Inseparable, unified, free from assertions,

original: gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya //🔽grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: gcig la gcig rgyas gdab par bya // grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: one should seal one with the other.

original: ces gsungs so //
analyzed: ces gsungs so //
translated: One will be liberated. There is no doubt about this.

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o ////
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung ba'i rgyud las rgyud phyi ma bskyed rim bstan pa'i le'u ste dang pa'o ////
translated: This is the first chapter, the chapter that explains the creation stage of the later tantra, the Tantra of the Emergence of Vārāhī, from the ḍākinīs’ mind, the inconceivable, nondual gnosis.

original: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas zhus pa /
analyzed: de nas dur khrod bdag mo des dpa' bo chen po la 'dzum pa dang bcas nas zhus pa /
translated: Then the charnel ground mistress, with a smile, asked the great hero:

original: gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags ni gang //
analyzed: gsang sngags rnams kyi sngags ni gang //
translated: “What is the mantra of the mantras?

original: bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang //
analyzed: bzlas par bya ba'i yi ge gang //
translated: What are the syllables to be recited?

original: 'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang //
analyzed: 'khor lo rnam bzhi dgod pa gang //
translated: What is the arrangement of the four wheels?

original: zhes zhus pas /
analyzed: zhes zhus pas /
translated: Thus it was requested.

original: he ru kas bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: he ru kas bka' stsal pa /
translated: Heruka replied:

original: dur khrod bdag mos gus par gyis //
analyzed: dur khrod bdag mos gus par gyis //
translated: “You who are the mistress of the charnel grounds, listen respectfully!

original: gsang sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags rnams kyi yi ge ni //
translated: The syllables of all secret mantras

original: thams cad byed pa yi ge aom//
analyzed: thams cad byed pa yi ge aom//
translated: are the syllable oṃ, which accomplishes everything.

original: dgyes pa sku yi yi ge ni //
analyzed: dgyes pa sku yi yi ge ni //
translated: The syllable of the delighted body

original: badzra b'a ra hi zhes 'byung //
analyzed: badzra b'a ra hi zhes 'byung //
translated: is said to be vajra-varāhī.

original: nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro t'a k'a li //
analyzed: nus pa 'byung ba gsung gi kro t'a k'a li //
translated: The arising of power is the speech, krodhākalī.

original: rtogs pa thugs ni ha ri sa //
analyzed: rtogs pa thugs ni ha ri sa //
translated: Realization is the mind, hṛṣīka.

original: yon tan 'byung ba a'a be sha ya //
analyzed: yon tan 'byung ba a'a be sha ya //
translated: The arising of qualities is āveśa.

original: phrin las mdzad pa ae bam ma y'a //
analyzed: phrin las mdzad pa ae bam ma y'a //
translated: The performance of activity is evaṃ-mayā.

original: de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste //
analyzed: de las gzhan yang 'di lta ste //
translated: Furthermore, it is as follows:

original: 'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du //
analyzed: 'khor lo lnga yi dbus nyid du //
translated: In the center of the five wheels,

original: yi ge bzhi pas rgyas btab nas //
analyzed: yi ge bzhi pas rgyas btab nas //
translated: sealed by the four syllables,

original: bzlas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum //
analyzed: bzlas pa phyi nang gsang ba gsum //
translated: there are three kinds of recitations: outer, inner, and secret.

original: zhi ba phyi yi bzlas pa ni //
analyzed: zhi ba phyi yi bzlas pa ni //
translated: The outer recitation for peace

original: yig ' bru rnams ni kha dog dkar //
analyzed: yig ' bru rnams ni kha dog dkar //
translated: is the white syllables.

original: de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros //
analyzed: de las 'od zer dkar po 'phros //
translated: White light rays radiate from that

original: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun //
analyzed: nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa kun //
translated: and purify all afflictive obscurations and knowledge obscurations.🔽The outer recitation for increase

original: ba sbu'i sgo nas bstan pa yi //
analyzed: ba sbu'i sgo nas bstan pa yi //
translated: is the yellow syllables.🔽Yellow light rays radiate from that🔽and increase all the enjoyments of gods and humans.🔽The outer recitation for power🔽is the red syllables.🔽Red light rays radiate from that🔽and summon all the objects of subjugation.🔽The outer recitation for wrath🔽is the black syllables.🔽Black light rays radiate from that🔽and destroy all the objects of harm.

original: sems can kun la phog pas kyang //
analyzed: sems can kun la phog pas kyang //
translated: Also striking all sentient beings,

original: sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam //🔽de bzhin @556a *//
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad dag par bsam // de bzhin @556a *//
translated: think that all obscurations are purified.

original: gshegs la phog pas kyang //
analyzed: gshegs la phog pas kyang //
translated: Also striking the tathāgatas,

original: mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so //
analyzed: mnyes pa'i mchod pa phul bas so //
translated: offer pleasing offerings.

original: bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub //
analyzed: bdag la slar thim zhi ba 'grub //
translated: They dissolve back into oneself, and peace is accomplished.

original: rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis /
analyzed: rgyas pa ser po 'phro 'du yis /
translated: For increase, yellow light radiates and returns as before.

original: gong bzhin spro bsdu shes par bya //🔽dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya //
analyzed: gong bzhin spro bsdu shes par bya // dmar po dbang gi 'phro 'du bya //
translated: One should understand the emanation and return.🔽For power, red light radiates and returns.

original: drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya //🔽sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i //
analyzed: drag po nag po'i 'phro 'du bya // sna tshogs 'phros pas phrin las bzhi'i //
translated: For wrath, black light radiates and returns.🔽Since the various lights radiate, all powers

original: dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa yin //
translated: of the four activities are accomplished.

original: nang dang gsang ba'i bzlas pa yang //
analyzed: nang dang gsang ba'i bzlas pa yang //
translated: Also, the inner and secret recitations

original: gong bzhin sbro bsdu shes par bya //
analyzed: gong bzhin sbro bsdu shes par bya //
translated: should be understood as the emanation and return as before.

original: dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa //
analyzed: dur khrod phag mos yang gsol pa //
translated: The charnel ground ḍākinī asked:

original: zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang //
analyzed: zad cing 'phel bar byed pa gang //
translated: “What causes exhaustion and increase?

original: mthar thug pa yi yi ge gang //🔽zhes zhus so //
analyzed: mthar thug pa yi yi ge gang // zhes zhus so //
translated: What is the ultimate syllable?”

original: dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa //🔽gti mug zad byed aa yin te //🔽has ni zhe sdang zad par byed //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa // gti mug zad byed aa yin te // has ni zhe sdang zad par byed //
translated: The great hero replied:🔽“A is for the exhaustion of stupidity.🔽H is for the exhaustion of anger.

original: da rgyal zad byed ri yin te //
analyzed: da rgyal zad byed ri yin te //
translated: R is for the exhaustion of desire.

original: ni yis 'dod chags zad par byed //
analyzed: ni yis 'dod chags zad par byed //
translated: Ni is the exhaustion of desire.

original: phrag dog zad byed sa yin no //
analyzed: phrag dog zad byed sa yin no //
translated: Sa is the exhaustion of envy.

original: aa ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel //
analyzed: aa ni chos dbyings ye shes 'phel //
translated: A is the increase of the wisdom of the dharmadhatu.

original: ha ni me long ye shes 'phel //🔽ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel //
analyzed: ha ni me long ye shes 'phel // ri yis mnyam nyid ye shes 'phel //
translated: Ha is the increase of the mirror-like wisdom.🔽Ri is the increase of the wisdom of equality.

original: ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel //
analyzed: ni yis so sor rtog byed 'phel //
translated: Ni is the increase of the wisdom of individual investigation.

original: sa yis bya grub ye shes 'phel //
analyzed: sa yis bya grub ye shes 'phel //
translated: Sa is the increase of the wisdom of accomplishment of activity.

original: aa ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gror snang //🔽ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang //
analyzed: aa ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gror snang // ha ni rdo rje mkha' 'gror snang //
translated: A is the appearance of the buddha dakini.🔽Ha is the appearance of the vajra dakini.

original: ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang //
analyzed: ri ni rin chen mkha' 'gror snang //
translated: Ri is the appearance of the ratna dakini.

original: ni yis padma mkha' 'gror snang //
analyzed: ni yis padma mkha' 'gror snang //
translated: Ni is the appearance of the padma dakini.

original: sa yis las kyi mkha' 'gror snang //
analyzed: sa yis las kyi mkha' 'gror snang //
translated: Sa is the appearance of the karma dakini.

original: aas ni de bzhin rigs thob ste //
analyzed: aas ni de bzhin rigs thob ste //
translated: By A one attains the tathagata lineage.

original: has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob //
analyzed: has ni rdo rje'i rigs chen thob //
translated: By Ha one attains the great vajra lineage.

original: ri ni rin chen rigs thob ste //
analyzed: ri ni rin chen rigs thob ste //
translated: By Ri one attains the ratna lineage.

original: ni yis padma'i rigs thob bo //
analyzed: ni yis padma'i rigs thob bo //
translated: By Ni one attains the padma lineage.

original: sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob //
analyzed: sa ni las kyi rigs chen thob //
translated: By Sa one attains the great karma lineage.

original: chos sku'i mthar thug aa yin te //
analyzed: chos sku'i mthar thug aa yin te //
translated: The ultimate dharmakaya is A.🔽The sambhogakaya aspect is the syllable Ha.

original: longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge @556b ha; ;sbrul pa sku ni ri yin no //
analyzed: longs sku'i rnam pa yi ge @556b ha; ;sbrul pa sku ni ri yin no //
translated: The nirmanakaya is Ri.

original: ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid sku'i yi ge ni //
translated: The svabhavikakaya syllable is Sa.

original: rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku ni yi ge sa // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The vajra body is the syllable sa.

original: dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa //
analyzed: dur khrod bdag mos yang zhus pa //
translated: The Mistress of the Charnel Ground asked again:

original: dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis //
analyzed: dbang po rab 'bring rim pa yis //
translated: “By what stages of highest and middling faculties

original: ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar shes na grol bar 'gyur //
translated: will one be liberated if one knows them?”

original: dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa //
analyzed: dpa' bo chen pos yang gsungs pa //
translated: The Great Hero replied:

original: dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te //
analyzed: dbang po rab 'bring gsum yin te //
translated: “There are three: highest, middling, and lowest faculties.

original: dbang po rab kyi gang zag la //
analyzed: dbang po rab kyi gang zag la //
translated: For the person with the highest faculties,

original: skad cig drug gi gdams ngag bstan //
analyzed: skad cig drug gi gdams ngag bstan //
translated: the instruction of the six moments is taught.

original: ye shes skad cig dang po yis //
analyzed: ye shes skad cig dang po yis //
translated: With the first moment of gnosis,

original: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcad //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa gcad //
translated: the concept of the apprehended is severed.

original: skad cig gnyis pa'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: skad cig gnyis pa'i ye shes kyis //
translated: With the gnosis of the second moment,

original: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcad //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gcad //
translated: the concept of the apprehender is severed.

original: skad cig gsum pa'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: skad cig gsum pa'i ye shes kyis //
translated: With the gnosis of the third moment,

original: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa gcad //
analyzed: gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi rtog pa gcad //
translated: the concept of both the apprehended and apprehender is severed.🔽With the gnosis of the fourth moment,

original: skad cig bzhi pa'i ye shes kyis; ;nyams la zhe na pa'i rnam rtog gcad //
analyzed: skad cig bzhi pa'i ye shes kyis; ;nyams la zhe na pa'i rnam rtog gcad //
translated: the concept of desire for experience is severed.

original: skad cig lnga pa'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: skad cig lnga pa'i ye shes kyis //
translated: With the gnosis of the fifth moment,

original: nyams myong bde pa'i rnam rtog gcad //
analyzed: nyams myong bde pa'i rnam rtog gcad //
translated: the concept of the bliss of experience is severed.

original: skad cig drug pa'i ye shes kyis //
analyzed: skad cig drug pa'i ye shes kyis //
translated: With the gnosis of the sixth moment,

original: yid la byed pa'i rnam tog bcad //
analyzed: yid la byed pa'i rnam tog bcad //
translated: the concept of mental activity is severed.

original: grol 'gyur rab la the tshom med //
analyzed: grol 'gyur rab la the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that one will be liberated.

original: dbang po 'bring po'i gang zag la //🔽rlung drug man ngag bstan pa ni //
analyzed: dbang po 'bring po'i gang zag la // rlung drug man ngag bstan pa ni //
translated: For a person of medium capacity,🔽The instruction is to train in the six vāyus.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung goms pas //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i rlung goms pas //
translated: By training in the connate vāyu,

original: rang bzhin sgrib pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: rang bzhin sgrib pa sel bar byed //
translated: The obscuration of the natural state is removed.

original: thad kar 'byung ba'i rlung goms pas //
analyzed: thad kar 'byung ba'i rlung goms pas //
translated: By training in the direct vāyu,

original: mtshan mo lta bu'i sgrib pa sel //
analyzed: mtshan mo lta bu'i sgrib pa sel //
translated: The obscuration of the night is removed.

original: rang las skyes pa'i rlung goms pas //
analyzed: rang las skyes pa'i rlung goms pas //
translated: By training in the self-originated vāyu,

original: chod pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: chod pa'i sgrib pa sel bar byed //
translated: The obscuration of the interruption is removed.

original: spong byed rlung la goms pa yis //
analyzed: spong byed rlung la goms pa yis //
translated: By training in the abandoning vāyu,

original: sngon du rgyu ba'i sgrib pa sel //
analyzed: sngon du rgyu ba'i sgrib pa sel //
translated: The obscuration of the prior movement is removed.

original: sbyong byed rlung la goms pa yis //
analyzed: sbyong byed rlung la goms pa yis //
translated: By training in the purifying vāyu,

original: shes bya'i sgrib pa sel bar byed //
analyzed: shes bya'i sgrib pa sel bar byed //
translated: The obscuration of the object of knowledge is removed.

original: rdzogs byed rlung la goms pa yis //
analyzed: rdzogs byed rlung la goms pa yis //
translated: By training in the completing vāyu,

original: sa rnams rim gyis gnon par byed //
analyzed: sa rnams rim gyis gnon par byed //
translated: The stages of the bhūmis are gradually traversed.

original: ye shes rnams ni du sa gcig 'char //🔽shes bya @557a *//
analyzed: ye shes rnams ni du sa gcig 'char // shes bya @557a *//
translated: The single taste of pristine consciousness arises.

original: thams cad dus gcig chod //
analyzed: thams cad dus gcig chod //
translated: All objects of knowledge are simultaneously cut.

original: rlung drug ma yin ye shes yin //
analyzed: rlung drug ma yin ye shes yin //
translated: The six vāyus are not pristine consciousness.

original: mun ba rnams ni bsgribs pa yis //
analyzed: mun ba rnams ni bsgribs pa yis //
translated: The darkness is obscured.

original: ye shes rim gyis skye ba dang / sgrib rim gyis sel bar byed //
analyzed: ye shes rim gyis skye ba dang / sgrib rim gyis sel bar byed //
translated: and obscurations are gradually removed.

original: grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
analyzed: grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med //
translated: There is no doubt that one will be liberated.

original: dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la //
analyzed: dbang po tha ma'i gang zag la //
translated: For the person of average capacity,

original: yul  ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing //🔽lus dag pa ni dkyil 'khor yin //
analyzed: yul  ni dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing // lus dag pa ni dkyil 'khor yin //
translated: the field is the pure buddhafield,🔽the pure body is the maṇḍala,

original: rang sems dag pa phag mo'i sku //
analyzed: rang sems dag pa phag mo'i sku //
translated: the pure mind is the form of Vārāhī,

original: ngag dag pa ni sngags su gsungs //
analyzed: ngag dag pa ni sngags su gsungs //
translated: the pure voice is said to be mantra,

original: lta bsgom dag pa dngos grub yin //
analyzed: lta bsgom dag pa dngos grub yin //
translated: and the pure view and meditation are spiritual powers.

original: dpe don gnyis su med pa gang //
analyzed: dpe don gnyis su med pa gang //
translated: The nondual example and meaning

original: skal med dngos grub mi 'byung bas //
analyzed: skal med dngos grub mi 'byung bas //
translated: will not arise as spiritual powers for the unfortunate.

original: lo drug bsgoms na the tshom med //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: lo drug bsgoms na the tshom med // ces gsungs so //
translated: If one meditates for six years, there is no doubt.

original: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung pa'i rgyud las rgyud phyi mdzob /🔽ser ma brten //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa phag mo mngon par 'byung pa'i rgyud las rgyud phyi mdzob / ser ma brten //
translated: In the Tantra of the Emergence of Vārāhī, the inconceivable, nondual pristine consciousness of the mind of all ḍākinīs,

original: pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa rdzogs so ////
translated: the second chapter, “The Explanation of the Practice of the Yellow-Bearded One,” is completed.

original: pandi ta ga ya dha ra'i zhal snga nas lo tstsha pa gyi jo zla ba 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o ////
analyzed: pandi ta ga ya dha ra'i zhal snga nas lo tstsha pa gyi jo zla ba 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o ////
translated: Translated by the pandit Gayadhara and the translator Gyijo Dawé Özer.
